name: Escape from Demon Island
description:
This is a vampire survivor game, including tower defense, survival, and light meat pigeon gameplay. Through a variety of weapons and skills, avoid and eliminate beasts and monsters, and finally eliminate the abyssal demons and escape. Enjoy yourself!

Enemy introduction

1. Randomly generated monsters, the monsters are different during the day and night!
2. Bosses are randomly generated. There are many types of bosses, each with their own skills. New bosses will be gradually added as the version changes!

Character introduction

1. Multiple characters can be selected, and each character has a unique skill. Using this skill well can increase your chances of survival! New characters will be gradually added as the version changes!
2. Players can destroy enemies by creating attack methods such as rotating knife towers, arrow towers, and magic towers, and gain experience to upgrade these weapons!

How to play

1. Obtain experience points by destroying monsters, 3 skill cards will appear randomly, choose one of them to enhance your character!
2. There are a variety of skill cards, such as upgrading the rotating knife tower, arrow tower, magic tower, etc., as well as its own attack auxiliary skills!
3. The boss will be different every time you encounter it, and the level will be cleared only by destroying all the bosses!
